titleStmt.title: Considerations touching the great question of the King's right in dispensing with the penal laws Written on the occasion of His late blessed Majesties granting free toleration and indulgence. By Richard Langhorn, late of the Middle Temple, Esq;
titleStmt.author: Langhorne, Richard, 1654-1679.
Langhorne, Richard, fl. 1687.

notesStmt.note: Roman numeral date is made with turned C's.
Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
